name: Captivating Curiosity
summary: You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance.
description:
You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance. You can cast enthrall as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day.Traits

Fleshwarp: A humanoid transformed so completely by outside forces that they are now a unique ancestry
